Articles.Content:
I figure it\'s about time i said gday to you all after being completely addicted to this game for the past couple of weeks. WOW this is one of the most creative games i\'ve played so far. After trawling through all the mods and downloads(obligatory) i must admit your Kreativity and modding ability is awesome to watch. My only hope for Persistence is there\'s NO headcount for the amount of Kerbonauts that I\'ve plastered onto the Mun,(sorry lads) as i imagine i\'ll be getting a visit from the Koroner, Anyway enough ramblings from me, Thanks HEAPS for the game and can\'t wait to see what the future of KSP holds,,,,,Mat

Oooh just pre-ordered so now i feel like part of the Kerbonaut eradication program,,hehe

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Thanks for the welcome guys, I was just reading about what persistence has in store,,Think i might need to work on a Mun Bulldozer to clean up all the (DEBRIS) er landed ships. At this rate clear real estate will be at a premium before too long, or i\'ll need some more bigger planets,,that sideways drift on landing really is amusing ,I\'ve got it to the point where the ships only fall apart on the Mun instead exploding, wont be long now till the eagle has landed, time for some more practice, thanks again,,,,,Madmat

Here\'s my 1st official landing,,takeoff didn\'t go so well with just 1 engine left,(should\'ve taken off with capsule and RCS only) but dammit the 1 legged eagle has landed!!! ;P

welcome aboard fellow Kerbil engineer!

Don\'t worry about Jeb, Bill and Bob, they always resurrect.

Welcome to the KSP forums!

Happy KSP playing.
